mapper.insert: insert into seller_info (s_index, m_index, s_nick, s_bank, s_holder, s_account, s_address, s_imgSrc) values(0, #{m_index}, #{s_nick}, #{s_bank}, #{s_holder}, #{s_account}, #{s_address}, #{s_imgSrc});
mapper.update: update seller_info set s_nick=#{s_nick}, s_bank=#{s_bank}, s_holder=#{s_holder}, s_account=#{s_account}, s_address=#{s_address}, s_imgSrc=#{s_imgSrc}, s_visit=#{s_visit}, s_sale=#{s_sale}, s_grade=#{s_grade}, s_date=#{s_date} where s_index=#{s_index};
